options.description: Specifies base theme name (default value is generic.light)

options.description: Specifies file name with input data (a .json file with metadata or a .less/.scss file with Bootstrap variables)

options.name: --make-swatch
options.description: If present, adds a CSS scope to each CSS rule (.dx-swatch-xxx), where xxx is the value from the --output-color-scheme parameter

options.name: --output-file
options.description: Specifies output file name

options.name: --output-color-scheme
options.description: Specifies custom color scheme name (default value is custom-scheme)

options.name: --version
options.description: Specifies target DevExtreme build or a tag that points to it (default value is 'latest')

options.name: --widgets
options.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of widgets whose styles should be included in the resulting CSS file. If this argument is not specified, styles used for all widgets are included. Available from DevExtreme v19.2.3.

options.name: --remove-external-resources
options.description: When present, removes links to external resources, such as fonts. The theme will use local fallbacks instead. Available from DevExtreme v20.2.7.

options.name: --bootstrap-version
options.description: Specifies Bootstrap version 4 or 5 if '--input-file' is a '.scss' file. Available from DevExtreme v21.1.5. Default value: 4.
